title: Check if a List Includes All Values (Challenge)
description: In Python, you can check if all the elements in one list are included in another list. This can be useful in many situations, such as verifying if a user's input matches a list of valid options. In this challenge, you will create a function that checks if all the values in a given list are included in another list.

meta.title: Check if a List Includes All Values
meta.description: Discover how to create a Python function that checks if all values in one list are included in another list.
